Node.definition: = experience by which humans see something in a dream or trance, or as a supernatural apparition
= man; ► prophet (נָבִיא)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= one who represents a person in authority and delivers his messages

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: to send (messengers through an area)|to send (messengers among people)
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities commission people to travel through a certain area or among a certain nation in order to perform a certain task
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= state in which humans are of relatively low esteem

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: to despise|to disdain|to scorn|to consider (something) beneath (oneself)
Node.definition: = state in which someone considers someone or something else unworthy of attention or respect, and shows that by his/her actions
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

= state in which humans have an exalted status in their own eyes, resulting in a failure to see the limits of what is permitted or appropriate in view of one's status, and act accordingly; ≈ often associated with sin, disobedience, foolishness, aggression, and rebellion against God
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= action with which someone misleads or deceives another person
= area that is difficult to reach, ◄ located within mountains or rocks, ► which people may use as a temporary or permanent dwelling place; ≈ and is regarded as relatively safe
= a location that has been chosen by humans or deities as their dwelling place

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to lower|to let down|to take down|to bring down|to take off (ornaments)
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects to move from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to cause to be high above
Node.definition: = causative action by which an object is created in a location high up in the air and out of human reach

exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= the area separating two or mores locations

= celestial body, providing light, and assisting the sun and moon in ruling day and night; ◄ created and controled by the divine; ≈ associated with a high and elevated position and sometimes personified as creatures that can sing and wage war

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
= structure, made by birds ◄ from twigs, straw, grass, or other materials, ► to lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security

Node.gloss: to lower|to let down|to take down|to bring down|to take off (ornaments)
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects to move from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= human who secretly takes possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: to ravage|to devastate|to lay waster|to plunder
Node.definition: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= process by which humans or objects are removed from existence, through death or total destruction
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= action by which humans secretly take possession of objects belonging to someone else, and sometimes even of other humans, without permission or legal right and usually without intending to return it
= state of being sufficient in quantity for a given purpose
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= person that picks or harvests grapes from vines
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= crops that are left on the field after the harvest, ≈ sometimes used figuratively to denote the aftermath of an event

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= action by which humans carefully examine a place in order to find people or objects located in it or in order to gain information about it
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)

Node.gloss: to be searched out|to be ransacked
Node.definition: = process by which someone explores or examines a certain location ► in order find what one is looking for; ≈ associated with violence
= objects of value that are usually kept invisible from others to keep them safe
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it

Node.gloss: to send away|to divorce|to expel|to remove|to cast out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities force (other) humans to go away from a certain location and/or position; ◄ due to a lack of affection, as punishment, or for other reasons
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= action with which someone misleads or deceives another person
= process by which humans can complete a certain activity successfully
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
= contraption, probably hidden on or in the ground; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment
= state in which humans, deities or animals have a certain level of wisdom, intelligence, or proficiency
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
= state whereby someone has the ability to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)

Node.gloss: to fear|to be afraid|to be discouraged
Node.definition: = state in which humans or animals lack inner strength and courage
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= area; ◄ territory of the most prominent tribe of Edom (אֱדֹום) ; ≈ sometimes used to refer to the entire territory of Edom
literally: to cut off (people); hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans to die a violent death
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
= causative action by which humans or deities cause people to die
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
literally: to cover; hence: = process by which certain events happen with a great intensity and are often more than the recipient can bear
= state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
literally: to cut off (people); hence: = causative action by which humans and deities cause (other) humans to die a violent death
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= causative action by which people, animals or objects are forcibly carried off; ► in the case of people, into slavery or exile
= a person considered as not belonging to a certain group, be it religious, ethnic, or social
= objects that people possess in a relatively large quantity; ≈ greatly valued by the owner, strongly coveted by other people, and a cause of status
= person who comes from a foreign country and therefore has a different status from those who are native born
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= action by which an object is caused to move from someone's hands toward a surface or place nearby
= the process of arriving at a decision based on casting the lot

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention
literally: to make great (one's) mouth; hence: = action by which humans speak boastful things
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

= action by which humans act towards other humans or deities in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward

Node.definition: literally: to come back on (someone's) head; hence: = process by which humans receive the appropriate return for their actions, which are mostly evil

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.

= dry grass like remnant of wheat or another grain crop following the harvest; this term possibly refers to two kinds of material, one being the remnant of the crop remaining in the ground, the other being the unwanted residue of stalks; ► only used for brick making; ≈ usually considered of little value and needing to be separated from the grain itself; maybe burned

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: the lowland; = the area situated between the hill country (הַר) and the coastal plain, which consists of foothills; named thus by the Israelites who occupied the hill country; known for its olive trees (זַיִת) and sycamore trees (שִׁקְמָה)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= the territory or rural region of a people group

= district around the town of Samaria; ◄ ranging from valley of Jezreel (יִזְרְעֶאל) in the north to the valley of Aijalon (אַיָּלֹון) in the south, with the Mediterranean and the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) as its respective western and eastern borders; ► after the conquest of the town of Samaria repopulated with people from other nations
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= area on east side of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ◄ supposedly named after Gilead, son of Makir (מָכִיר) tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= a group of people who have been forcibly taken from their land to another
= a collection of dwellings, surrounded by an outer fortification, ► functioning as a population center
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= descendant of Canaan (כְּנַעַן) son of Ham (חָם) son of Noah (נֹחַ) and inhabitant of the country named after them
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= town; ◄ located between Tyre (צֹר) and Sidon (צִידֹון) ► Phoenician sea port
= a group of people who have been forcibly taken from their land to another
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= town, identified with Sardis in Lydia by some, located in Media or Spain by others; ► place where some of the inhabitants of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) were exiled (ABD)
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= an area of land located in the south of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples initially by the Canaanites in Arad (עֲרָד) and the Amelekites (עֲמָלֵקִי) later, the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה)

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface
= man; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and older brother of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) ► who sold his birthright for a bowl of lentil stew; regarded as ancestor of the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
